entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
